funkwhale.description: A social platform to enjoy and share music

80.description: Funkwhale port for the API and web interface. Suggested default: 5000
80.label: Funkwhale port

/data.description: Choose a Share for all funkahwle data. Eg: create a Share called funkwhale for this purpose.
/data.label: Data

FUNKWHALE_HOSTNAME.label: Domain
FUNKWHALE_HOSTNAME.description: Domain the instance is available under.

FUNKWHALE_PROTOCOL.label: Protocol
FUNKWHALE_PROTOCOL.description: Protocol the instance should be advertised with. Can be http, https

NGINX_MAX_BODY_SIZE.label: Maximum upload size
NGINX_MAX_BODY_SIZE.description: Limits the file upload size. Recommended: 100M

FUNKWHALE_API_PORT.label: Exposed port
FUNKWHALE_API_PORT.description: Port that the instance is exposed on to the network.

DJANGO_SECRET_KEY.label: Django secret key
DJANGO_SECRET_KEY.description: Generate a secure secret key for the instance. Recommended generation method: openssl rand -hex 45

PUID.label: User
PUID.description: User that owns the funkwhale volume

GUID.label: Group
GUID.description: Group the user owning the funkwhale volume is in. Official documentation suggests that this is the docker group.

MEDIA_URL.label: Media URL
MEDIA_URL.description: Exposed URL for media. Should end with /media/.

funkwhale.more_info: Create an admin user using docker exec -it funkwhale manage createsuperuser
